about_the_game:
Assemble your triad and embark on an adventure across the realm of Lyria. Choose from 15 unique classes, each with their own epic questline to complete.

Build your Triad

Create a highly customized party of three classes drawn from a pool of 15. Each class is a combination of 2 base classes - will you battle with a righteous Paladin or an animalistic Warden? Each class scales uniquely from six stats, allowing you to build your characters in a multitude of ways!

Explore Lyria

Discover a world filled with distinct environments and unique enemies. Explore a massive open world teeming with towns, dungeons, cities, and intrigue, each with its own secrets to uncover.

A Nod to RPGs of an Older Time

Triad pays homage to classic RPGs, featuring highly customizable characters and parties that adhere to the traditional holy trinity. Prepare for an experience of brutal proportions, as Triad offers little hand-holding while you explore the vast expanses of Lyria.

KEY FEATURES

- 15 highly unique and distinct playable classes
- Tab based real-time combat with 3 controlled characters
- Rewarding loot loop with highly meaningful stats.
- All entities respawn - Factions can be ruined and built based on the types of enemies that you decide to kill
- Dozens of custom spells and effects created for each class.

short_description: Embark on an epic journey across the realm of Lyria in this real time fantasy RPG paying homage to classic games. Assemble your Triad from 15 unique classes, engage in strategic tab-targeting combat, and uncover ancient secrets in a world of danger and mystery.
